comments.bad_code: async def delete_secret(self, name: str, **kwargs: Any) -> DeletedSecret
comments.suggestion: async def begin_delete_secret(self, name: str, **kwargs: Any) -> AsyncLROPoller[DeletedSecret]
comments.comment: Long running operations should have a begin_ prefix and return a poller object rather than the final result type.

comments.bad_code: async def recover_deleted_secret(self, name: str, **kwargs: Any) -> SecretProperties
comments.suggestion: async def begin_recover_deleted_secret(self, name: str, **kwargs: Any) -> AsyncLROPoller[SecretProperties]
comments.comment: Long running operations should have a begin_ prefix and return a poller object rather than the final result type.
